description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Score a Touchdown with your Avatar! Features: 3 vs 3 Xbox LIVE Multiplayer, Full Season Mode, Design and Share your own Offense and Defense Plays, Customize and Share Rosters, and Much More!!! Avatar Football is for gamers of all ages and skill levels.
